p: The recent studies on drug repositioning/repurposing involve a variety of computational methods, such as network analysis, text mining, machine learning, and structure‐based drug repositioning (SBDR) [ 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, 24]. Among these methods, SBDR is the most promising to find specific drugs toward a defined target protein, and it prompted the quick structure analyses of SARS‐CoV‐2 3C‐like proteinase and surface glycoprotein [ 8, 25].
